description:
Early Bird tickets are now on sale for Front-Trends 2017, May 24-26. Get'em while they last! https://2017.front-trends.com/ 

Sometimes development can be hard, there's so much information, and so many new things constantly blasting out at usâ€¦ sometimes it can be a little too much.

Join Tim for a sarcastic, yet informative cartwheel through the badlands of designing, developing, and surviving the internet as we know it.
title: Don't Hate the Player, Hate the Game
